en: A key that unlocks the door to the Velvet Room.
A fallen leaf from a young tree.
A massively multiplayer PC game called Innocent Sin Online.
An envelope from Mitsuru to be discretely given to Aragaki.
An envelope from Aragaki. It seems he won't return to school.
A key that opens the door to the gym.
''At the end of a great trial, the answer illuminates my path.''
A strip of paper from Takaya, seemingly part of some research material.
A choker Tomochika made. Enables fusion of Futsunushi.
The headphones Fuuka made. Enables fusion of Scathach.
The key to Mitsuru's motorcycle. Enables fusion of Alilat.
Proof of Odagiri's trust. Enables fusion of Odin.
Fruit from Bunkichi's son's tree. Enables fusion of Kohryu.
Yukari's treasured cell phone strap. Enables fusion of Cybele.
A roll of sports tape from Miyamoto. Enables fusion of Thor.
A manga by Chihiro's favorite artist. Enables fusion of Melchizedek.
The message Maya left in the MMORPG. Enables fusion of Arahabaki.
Notification of Hiraga's prize. Enables fusion of Lakshmi.
A letter from the kids Yuko trained. Enables fusion of Atavaka.
The ring Maiko made. Enables fusion of Attis.
The pouch Bebe made. Enables fusion of Yurlungur.
The letter President Tanaka received. Enables fusion of Beelzebub.
Mutatsu's bottle tag. Enables fusion of Chi You.
A car key received from Hayase. Enables fusion of Helel.
A license received from Suemitsu. Enables fusion of Sandalphon.
A notebook containing Kamiki's story. Enables fusion of Asura.
A broken component from Aigis's body. Enables fusion of Metatron.
Enables fusion of the Hermit Persona, Mothman.
Enables fusion of the Emperor Persona, King Frost.
Enables fusion of the Fool Persona, Decarabia.
Enables fusion of the Hermit Persona, Nebiros.
Enables fusion of the Devil Persona, Lilith.
Enables fusion of the Tower Persona, Masakado.
Enables fusion of the Magician Persona, Hua Po.
Enables fusion of the Hierophant Persona, Thoth.
Enables fusion of the Judgement Persona, Lucifer.
Enables fusion of the Sun Persona, Houou.
Enables fusion of the Fool Persona, Orpheus Telos.

Hand powder used in archery. Looks like roasted soybean powder.
A slender sword with a triangular cross section that is hard to bend.
Has traces of having wiped a variety of things other than glasses.
A plant with red leaves. Sometimes called a ''Christmas star.''
Has a game called Odin Cube inserted in it.
It's quite used, but meticulously maintained.
A figure of a popular hero with 40 individually moveable joints.
Perfect for use by amateur athletes.
Expensive dog food. Can also be used to feed wolves and tigers.
A discarded human anatomic model. It's eerily realistic.
Non-alcoholic, but provides a small taste of being adult.
A mahjong tile from the mahjong parlor. It has a drawing of a bird on it.
Inari sushi received from an old woman.
Replica of a Sengoku-era helm. It has the symbol for ''love'' on it.
A CD recording of Gekkoukan Boogie. Comes with a lyrics card.
A business card signed by the president of Tanaka's Amazing Commodities.
An old 500-yen bill. Seems to still be useable.
A seashell found in Yakushima. Emits the sounds of distant waves.
Seaweed picked up in Yakushima. It smells intensely of the sea.
Driftwood from Yakushima. Has a unique shape, due to erosion.
A crab found in Yakushima. Moves quickly in dark places.
A cloth used for treating injuries. There may be someone who needs this.
A Gekkoukan student handbook. Should be returned to its owner.
One touch and they can't resist! For those wishing to befriend cats.
A thank-you letter regarding the rescue of a missing person.
A Christmas present from a self-proclaimed Santa. Wrapped neatly.
The Aohige Pharmacy owner's prized aojiru. Bitter yet sweet.
A baseball glove gifted from Junpei. Enables fusion of Surt.
Proof of recognition by Sanada. Enables fusion of Horus.
A collar attached with a protective charm. Enables fusion of Byakko.
Amada's commemoratory key. Enables fusion of Michael.
Proof Aragaki thought about his future. Enables fusion of Hell Biker.
A music box that Ryoji left behind. Enables fusion of Saturnus.

Brand-name, black-\nrimmed glasses that give off an air of intelligence.
A headband with cat ears that can make anybody cute.
Silly glasses with a fake nose attached that are sure to get a laugh.
A pointed, red hat that feels like Christmas. For Santas in training.
